dayDelete.title: Remove Day
dayDelete.description: Are you sure you want to remove this day?

daySharedLink.dayAddConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to add this shared day ({{ date, MMM DD, YYYY }})?

settingsAbout.title: About
settingsAbout.appDescription: “My Days” is intended to provide a quick overview of the time until/from an important event. Never forget when the next important date is with “My Days”!
settingsAbout.appReason: Created with ❤️ for a special person!
settingsAbout.appSummary: “My Days” is a simple mobile app to count down/up to important dates!
settingsAbout.guideTip1: Dates can be managed by long pressing on a list item and selecting "Edit" or "Delete" from the selection menu.
settingsAbout.guideTip2: Dates can be reordered from the list item selection menu.
settingsAbout.guideTip3: Icons can be added by tapping the icon in the "Add" or "Edit" dialogs.

settingsBehaviours.title: Behaviours
settingsBehaviours.behaviourItemConfirmSharedDaysDescriptio: Whether days shared via link must be confirmed before adding (safety).

settingsContributors.title: Contributors
settingsContributors.contributorThanks: Special thanks to all the people who have helped this project so far!

settingsDeveloper.title: Debug
settingsDeveloper.exitDeveloperConfirmDescription: Are you sure you want to exit developer mode?
settingsDeveloper.listItemPopulateDescription: Press and hold to insert debug app data
settingsDeveloper.listItemResetDescription: Press and hold to reset app data
settingsDeveloper.populateDataDescription: Added debug data can be removed easily once added!
settingsDeveloper.populateDataSuccess: Debug app data has been added
settingsDeveloper.resetDataDescription: This will reset the selected app state and is irreversible!

settingsReportBug.title: Report a Bug
settingsReportBug.reportDescription:
We are sorry to hear that something went wrong! Please provide a detailed report of the steps leading up to the issue, and the expected vs actual result.

Bug reports must currently be created in the GitHub repository. Please be sure to check for similar reports, to avoid creating duplicates!

Remember, the more detail and steps provided, the easier it will be resolve the issue!
